subject: Add documentation structure in docs/ folder
body:
- docs/SESSION_NOTES.md: Track current state for session continuity
- docs/TODO.md: Capture pending items and ideas
- docs/HISTORY.md: Log significant changes
- docs/USER_ACTIONS.md: Document manual user actions needed
- Updated CLAUDE.md references to point to docs/ folder

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
